head.title: Join {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Seamlessly integrate {{FileFormatUp}} file joining into your {{EnvNameShort}} projects using {{ProdFullName}}.

header.title: Join {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables you to join {{FileFormatUp}} documents effortlessly within your {{EnvNameShort}} applications, providing seamless integration and high performance.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a feature-rich document processing solution supporting over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives. With its robust set of tools, you can join, split, extract, swap, and remove pages efficiently.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document joining capabilities
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is optimized for handling a wide variety of document formats, offering extensive features for managing business documents.

feature_1.title: Join multiple document types
feature_1.content: Easily combine PDFs, Word files, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and other document types. Define specific page ranges to customize the join process.

feature_2.title: Modify and organize document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages, delete unwanted sections, or swap pages to create well-structured documents tailored to your needs.

feature_3.title: Customize page layout and orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any desired angle and adjust page orientation between landscape and portrait for various file types.

feature_4.title: Extract and save specific document pages
feature_4.content: Select particular pages from a document and save them as a separate file, ensuring easy access and organization.

formats.title: Join files in different formats
formats.description: With support for over 50 document types, {{ProdShortName}} streamlines file processing, making document handling simple and efficient.

operations.title: Key functionalities
operations.description: Discover additional operations and features supported by {{ProdShortName}} to enhance your document processing experience.

examples.comment_1: Initialize the {{NameProduct}} with the source {{FileFormatUp}} document
examples.comment_2: Join the document with another selected file
examples.comment_3: Save the final joined document to a preferred location

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), joining {{FileFormatUp}} documents is simple. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications with efficient document combination capabilities.
content.step_1: Provide the file path for the first {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Select the second document to be joined.
content.step_4: Execute the join process and save the output document.

code_1.title: Join selected pages from different document formats
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to join {{FileFormatUp}} files while selecting specific pages from documents in other formats.
code_1.comment_1: Define the path of the main document
code_1.comment_2: Configure options to include specific pages
code_1.comment_3: Join the primary file with selected pages from another document
code_1.comment_4: Save the final document in the desired location
